body:
Comment 3: 
#1 What I meant is the following:

  var m map[string]int = ...

  keys := make([]string, 0, len(m))
  values := make([]int, 0, len(m))

  for k, v := range m {
    keys = append(keys, k)
    values = append(values, v)
  }

Instead one would write

  keys := keys(m)
  values := vals(m)
